mods.abstract: $100 REWARD. RANAWAY from the undersigned, in Opelousas about two months ago, a negro-boy of griff color, named Edward, aged 27 years, about 5 feet, 8 or 9 inches in height, he speaks the French and English languages. The undersigned believes that he is harbored about or in the Town of Opelousas. He will give $25 reward to the person who will bring him back to him or lodge him in the jail of this parish, and $100 for the detection of the person who is harboring him. WARREN R. MEGINLEY. Opelousas, September 6th, 1856.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
